definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
Study everything, at all times, everywhere. (Zhu Xi 朱熹[Zhu1 Xi1])
pinyin: wu2 yi1 shi4 er2 bu4 xue2 , wu2 yi1 shi2 er2 bu4 xue2 , wu2 yi1 chu4 er2 bu4 de2
containing_words.word: 無一事而不學，無一時而不學，無一處而不得

sentences.english: He bore away to the left, stopping now and again to eat muskeg berries.
sentences.chinese: 他取道向左，時而停下來喫些苔蘚漿果。

sentences.english: No one fainted at the sight of the aircraft being trafficked onto the runway.
sentences.chinese: 沒有一個人因爲看到飛機在跑道上交易時而昏厥。

sentences.english: The plane rolled left and then rolled right. Then he caught an edge of his wing on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 飛機時而向左時而向右滾動，最終機翼觸地。

sentences.english: The plane rolled left and then rolled right. Then he caught an edge of his wing on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 飛機時而向左時而向右滾動，最終機翼觸地。

sentences.english: Is cold sky of light prologues, that mild eye Jing but all over undressed.
sentences.chinese: 冷天淡淡開口，那雙平淡的眼精時而冒出精光。

sentences.english: These alternations of mood were the despair and joy of Ethan Frome.
sentences.chinese: 她這樣一會兒一種情緒，叫伊坦時而灰心，時而高興。

sentences.english: These alternations of mood were the despair and joy of Ethan Frome.
sentences.chinese: 她這樣一會兒一種情緒，叫伊坦時而灰心，時而高興。

sentences.english: Her singing sometimes sonorous, powerful, sometimes soft lyrical.
sentences.chinese: 她的演唱時而鏗鏘有力，時而柔美抒情。

sentences.english: Her singing sometimes sonorous, powerful, sometimes soft lyrical.
sentences.chinese: 她的演唱時而鏗鏘有力，時而柔美抒情。

sentences.english: She couldn't recognize her face. Then she would start crying at times and laughing at times," Pillai says.
sentences.chinese: 她不認得自己的臉，還時而哭時而笑，”皮拉伊說。

sentences.english: She couldn't recognize her face. Then she would start crying at times and laughing at times," Pillai says.
sentences.chinese: 她不認得自己的臉，還時而哭時而笑，”皮拉伊說。

sentences.english: The wind leafs through the trees:and I know what passes there for words, and sometimes repeat them softly.
sentences.chinese: 風翻動林葉，我知曉它們的話語，並時而柔聲複誦。

sentences.english: I am quiet, she is humming, When the Stars Go Blue.
sentences.chinese: 我沉默不語，她時而嘆息，此刻繁星也變得愁悶。

sentences.english: As universitys social being has been changeable, its-idea must be changed as time goes on.
sentences.chinese: 大學的社會存在在變化，大學理念也必須相時而變。

sentences.english: Sometimes several clusters of white clouds drift across the blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 蔚藍色的天空中，時而飄過幾朵白雲。

sentences.english: It speeds up and it slows down and it wobbles as it rotates.
sentences.chinese: 它時而加速時而減緩，並且當它轉動時總是在搖擺。
